page.title: 14A PARENT'S DAY - BRAYTON
page.content: {Mum}gets up at{7.30 am.}gets washed and dressed, then makes breakfast. She has breakfast with the family, then washes up. At{8.30}she takes Gareth and me up to school and drives on to work (Brayton High School). She teaches French all day apart from a few free lessons where she catches up on other business. At lunch she checks everyone is behaving.{3.50 pm.}school finishes and she usually gets out about{4.15pm.}unless there is a meeting, then it's 5.00pm. Mum picks us two up and goes home. I have tea and Mum takes me up to Gym. The family has tea and at 7.30 Mum picks me up from Gym. She marks the school books, then sets the work up for Friday. At 9.00 she stops and reads. At 10.15 she makes her supper and then goes to bed. {Louise Marland
